Reviews.Title: “Looking to spend money elsewhere on your vacation? This is the place to stay!”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed heart weekend trip chicago pleased obviously pay hotel cheap didnt expect paid clean rest heads night shower day town happy service front desk read lot reviews heart tripadvisor trip shocked reviews terrible service front desk received pleased service received elderly front desk informative public transit easy reason chose stay heart planned drinking didnt drive car overall comfortable cheap clean met expectations laidback 23 olds definitely stay
